availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Brooks (Mount Vernon, Kentucky, hotel keeper)

body.p: Mount Vernon, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Rockcastle County, Kentucky, native. Son of Richard Brooks, Sr., and Nancy Brooks. Married to Sarah E. Carson Brooks in Rockcastle County on May 17, 1858. Father of James W. Brooks, Mollie Brooks, and John C. Brooks. Hotel keeper in Mount Vernon in 1860. Hotel keeper in Mount Vernon in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern Division, p. 164.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, p. 7.
